text: Vernon John Lewis (22 May 1881 – 25 March 1941) was an English amateur footballer and minor counties cricketer. Lewis was born at Woodbridge, Suffolk. He played football for Ipswich Town from 1900 to 1911, making 185 appearances and scoring six goals. This also included a spell as captain. Lewis also played cricket at minor counties level for Suffolk from 1906-10, making sixteen appearances in the Minor Counties Championship. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:1941 deaths Category:People from Woodbridge, Suffolk Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:English cricketers Category:Suffolk cricketers Category:English Football League players
title: Vernon Lewis (footballer)
